Alan Dean wrote:
> My initial answer is: guess what you have now - exactly that situation, only
> it isn't surfaced as a media type issue. Instead, it is surfaced as opaque
> representations on the wire with no easy means to work out what the data
> means, coupled with (in certain cases) magic URIs.

Before this spirals in to a 100-long thread, can we get right back to 
roots and clearly define what the problem is with the current media 
types / IANA registry setup?

Best,

Nathan
